If toggled, only reddit quotes will be shown in loading screens (default). If disabled, both gameplay tips and reddit quotes will be shown at random.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ShitRimWorldSays.MinimumKarma.Too: Only posts with at least this much karma will be shown. Provides some semblance of quality control.
LanguageData.Fluffy.ShitRimWorldSays.TipsOnMainMenu.T: Should quotes and tips be shown on the main menu?
